txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Thick Tails from the worms, avanc, and turtles in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the thick tails for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough thick tails to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Thick Tails
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect thick tails from worms, avanc, and turtles. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the thick tails to any task-board in Great River
You have accepted a task to acquire thick tails.
Wanted: Thick Tails from the worms, avanc, and turtles in the Great River region.
